Source.Name: libsigsegv
Source.Summary: GNU libsigsegv is a library for handling page faults in user mode.
Source.Description: GNU libsigsegv is a library for handling page faults in user mode. A page fault occurs when a program tries to access to a region of memory that is currently not available.
